room_title: Escape room " Captive" by Twisted Exit in Lancaster (CA)
room_description:
For too long now, you have been avoiding life in favor of just existing, merely getting by. Doing the bare minimum to make it through another day. Wasting away instead of appreciating your life. That is, until you wake up disoriented and locked in a room filled with horrors, the likes of which you've never seen. Now you are in a fight for your life and the only way out is to face your fears.

The puzzlemaster has devised a number of hellish games that will make you confront everything you have been avoiding by hiding in your "safe space". You will have to summon every ounce of courage to pass his tests, play his games and survive the 60 minutes in order to escape. We want to play a game!
